ctx: induction pl as [b pl0 IH0 pl1 IH1 |].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros d pl a H. induction pl as [b pl0 IH0 pl1 IH1 |]. - simpl in H. assert (H_or: MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl0) a = Some true \/ MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl1) a = Some true) by (apply map_or_mapget_true_inv; assumption). destruct H_or as [H_pl0 | H_pl1]. + right. apply IH0. auto. + apply map_replace_mapget_true_inv in H. destruct H as [H_head | H_tail]. * subst. apply prec_hd. * right. apply IH1. auto. - simpl in H. exfalso. apply map_mini_mapget_true with (A:=state) (x:=d) (a:=a). auto.
